a1: Are they one of the powerhouses in South American football?
q2: Not recently, they barely qualified to the World Cup.
a2: Argentina likes to believe they have a strong team.
q3: How many more years before argentina make up for a poor world cup?
a3: As long as they have Jorge Sampaoli it may be a long time.
a4: Je pense que ce sera la prochaine coupe
q5: Argentina is the best team that is right now in South America and has Messi
a5: I always though Brazil were better than Argentina.
